friendRequests.none: No crew requests at the moment

offline.default: Ye be offline—some tricks be locked until ye reconnect.

location.requiredBody: Turn on yer location to spy nearby treasure on the map. Captains may skip this check.
location.retryError: Couldn’t fetch yer location. Check permissions and try once more.

bookmarks.title: Stashed loot
bookmarks.subtitle: Find yer buried pins quick. Loot be grouped by chests and can be tossed anytime.

report.title: Report scallywag
report.detailsPlaceholder: Share details for the crew that moderates.
report.helperDefault: Reports be anonymous. The crew reviews every note.

notifications.quickActionsDescription: Mute delivery temporarily without changing your preferences.
notifications.muteActive: Mute scheduled. Save your settings to keep it active.
notifications.muteInactive: Muting pauses delivery without changing the toggles below. Save after applying changes.
notifications.channelsDescription: Choose which updates reach you across the app.
notifications.chatIntensityDescription: Fine-tune how often direct messages and chat highlights ping you.
notifications.chatIntensityNote: “Mute” blocks chat alerts even if the toggle above stays on. “All activity” behaves like Highlights until we surface lower-signal pings.
notifications.digestDescription: Bundle low-priority updates into daily or weekly recaps.
notifications.quietDescription: Pause non-critical notifications on a weekly schedule.
notifications.channelBundlesDescription: Start from a preset and then tweak individual toggles.

privacy.sharingDescription: Your location is used only to enable features (radius checks, proximity chat). It is never shared with other users.
privacy.sharingBody: Location is required to confirm you are in-range for map interactions, but your exact location is never shown to other people.
privacy.visibilityDescription: Decide how much information other members can see.
privacy.statsPublic: Allow others to view my stats
privacy.filterCussWords: Filter explicit language in public chats
privacy.dmDescription: Choose who can start new conversations with you.
privacy.dmNote: Friends-only mode also allows people who follow you. Selecting “No one” hides you from new threads.
privacy.accountDescription: Block someone or jump into admin/profile views.

integrations.exportsDescription: Request a copy of your data and set monthly reminders.
integrations.exportEmail: We’ll email you a link whenever an export finishes.
integrations.exportReminders: Remind me to export my data each month
integrations.exportNudge: We’ll send a gentle nudge inside the app when it’s time for your next export.
integrations.tokensDescription: Generate personal access tokens for scripts and integrations.
integrations.tokenWarning: API tokens behave like passwords. Revoke any token you no longer use.

bio.title: Bio
bio.empty: This user hasn't added a bio yet.

badges.title: Badges & achievements
badges.defaultDescription: Earn this badge to uncover its story.
badges.empty: No badges yet. They will appear here once this user starts collecting achievements.

mutual.title: Mutual friends
mutual.empty: You have no mutual friends yet. Start connecting!

moderation.title: Moderator tools
moderation.description: Only visible to staff/offline builds. Use responsibly—actions are logged.
moderation.noAccess: Moderator privileges required. If you should have access, refresh after updating roles.
moderation.emptyHistory: No prior moderation actions logged for this user.

errors.emailInvalid: That email looks foul. Try again.
errors.passwordRequired: Set a passphrase afore ye sail.
errors.passwordConfirmRequired: Confirm yer passphrase in both fields.
errors.passwordMismatch: Those passphrases don’t match. Try again.
errors.passwordWeak: That passphrase be too flimsy. Beef it up.
errors.passwordMin: Passphrase must be at least 6 characters.
errors.resetLinkInvalid: This reset link be cursed or already used.
errors.loginNotFound: No account found with this email.
errors.appleUnavailable: Apple sign-in be unavailable in these waters.
errors.appleLinked: This email be linked to a different sign-in method. Use the original provider.
errors.resetExpired: This link expired. Fetch a fresh reset.
errors.resetInvalid: Invalid action code. Request another reset link.
errors.resetWeakPassword: Passphrase too weak. Choose a stronger one.
errors.registrationValidation: Fix the marked fields afore proceeding.
errors.registrationDefault: Couldn’t create yer berth. Try again.
errors.registrationEmailInUse: A mate already claimed this email.
errors.registrationNotAllowed: Email/password sign-up be locked right now.
errors.registrationWeakPassword: Passphrase be too weak. Add more characters or symbols.
errors.passwordResetNotFound: No account tied to that email.
errors.phoneInvalid: That number looks off. Try again.

forgot.title: Forgot yer passphrase?
forgot.instruction: Drop the email for the berth ye seek to enter.
forgot.success: If this email be in use, a reset note be on its way.

reset.title: Reset yer passphrase
reset.success: Passphrase reset! Sending ye back to the log...

register.title: Sign aboard
register.success: Berth created! Redirecting ye to the log...

language.title: Language
language.description: Pick your preferred language for PinPoint.
